attributes.action: Let the public have our say of were our taxes are spent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that our taxes should be payed to benefit ourselves the british public not the people who free load.
In this I mean benefit scrongers who don't work and are just living off the doll. Why should I pay for them to sit at home all day popping out kids..? Why should I work my backside off to let someone sit on theres in front of the TV..?
I believe that my taxes should pay for my secutity and health I.E the NHS which is poorly funded, Schools, Police (which needs a lot of help because of the increase in crime includng guns and knifes), Fire Brigade and armed forces.

Not the social scronging people that this country is producing at an alarming rate...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
